TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Colonies...filming to begin shortly

Articles.Content:
Alright, as a predecessor to my upcoming STS recreation, I am going to film a more Kerbalized version using the fantastic stock model by inigma. This series is by request by him. My decision to use his model over the rather fantastic looking shuttle model by Zekes, is mainly due to part count. I don't really want to try to use Zekes model as it may be a bit too much for my computer to handle alongside the filming software. On the other hand, inigama's space shuttle is a bit more manageable, by far. I plan to begin filming tonight.

Edited February 11, 2015 by Sampa
fixed my spelling error for inigma from inigama
Forgot to mention, I will be using mods in this series, so if there are any mods you would like to see used in the series, I ask that you please speak up and let me know!

You mean inigma, right?

Lookin' forward to the series!
woops! Thanks for catching that mistake! Yes, I did mean inigma
